content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other drill found) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) and transport belts at positions (x=63.5 y=-53.5) and (x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them, as seen in burner mining drills and burners at positions (x=41.0 y=-82.0) and (x=41.5 y=-78.5)
- Ensure that burner entities are connected to a power source, as seen in steam engine at position (x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Errors when using electricity entities
- Ensure that electricity entities are plugged into an electric network, as seen in electricity group at position (x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Errors when using inserter entities
- Ensure that inserter entities have source items before attempting to use them, as seen in burner inserter at position (x=39.5 y=-79.5)

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
